definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: I'll have the express delivery service send my ski.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪板用快遞寄過去吧。

sentences.english: Fiberglass skis in the snow for any snow quality, but the price is higher.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃纖維滑雪板適合任何雪質的雪地，但價格較高。

sentences.english: The skis should be parallel by the end of the turn.
sentences.chinese: 在一個轉彎結束時雪板應該是平行的。

sentences.english: A board used for descending snow-covered slopes on one's feet but without ski poles.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪板，用於徒步和沒有滑雪杖幫助而從雪坡滑下來。

sentences.english: Similar to a Backscratcher, bend your knees so the Skis will be behind you.
sentences.chinese: 和背撓類似，彎曲雙膝，這樣你的雪板就在你的後面。

sentences.english: "Snowboarding is much newer than skiing, " he said.
Pack your skis and your hiking boots and follow us.
sentences.chinese: 拿好你的滑雪板和登山靴到科羅拉多來吧。

sentences.english: Top racers release the pressure coming out of the fall-line.
sentences.chinese: 頂級選手在滑經滾落線的之後就開始釋放雪板的壓力。

sentences.english: The only sound you hear is your skis swishing through the snow.
sentences.chinese: 耳中只聽見滑雪板滑過雪地的嗖嗖聲。

sentences.english: The easiest wheelie to do is on the tail of your snowboard.
sentences.chinese: 最簡單的車特技做的是對你的滑雪板尾。

sentences.english: Let the movements from side to side to decide how much your skis will turn.
sentences.chinese: 從一邊滑到另一邊，以掌握雪板的轉動量。

sentences.english: This is way you manipulated the skis to turn into towards the slope.
sentences.chinese: 這就是操縱雪板轉向山下的方法。

sentences.english: Snowboarders are generally younger than skiers.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪板愛好者一般比較年輕。

sentences.english: Then there are all those skis and ice skates.
sentences.chinese: 然後就是一些滑板和滑雪板。

sentences.english: The getter up of two clubs will have a pair of skates, and a double breasted pink undershirt thrown in.
sentences.chinese: 裝扮還應該還有一雙滑雪板以及內附粉紅雙襟汗衫。

sentences.english: Snowboarding boots are constructed from plastics like nylon.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪板靴是由塑料材料製成的，比如尼龍。

definition: to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
